extension.name: My Pricing
extension.author: Valentín García
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description:
My Pricing

My Pricing show your pricing tables in an easy way.

Info and support: www.valentingarcia.com.mx

field.name: vgplan1_status
field.label: Enable
field.description: Set YES to show this Plan

field.name: vgplan1_name
field.label: Name
field.description: Name of this plan. Leave in blank to disable.

field.name: vgplan1_price
field.label: Price
field.description: Price for this plan. EXAMPLE: 39.00 OR: 39. Leave in blank to disable.

field.name: vgplan1_content
field.label: Content ( separate with :: )
field.description: Set the content for this plan using :: to add break lines. EXAMPLE: Free setup::Domain name::Access to database. Leave in blank to disable.

field.name: vgplan1_txtlink
field.label: Text for read more link
field.description: Text for a link. EXAMPLE: Read more. Leave in blank to disable.

field.name: vgplan1_link
field.label: URL for read more link
field.description: URL. EXAMPLE: http://mysite.com/readmore OR: /readmore.html. Leave in blank to disable.
